nodes.text: Armo Drane and his wife, Tso Sook Drane, knew an individual named Jollar. Arno sent a letter to his wife wishing her and Jollar well while he was being sent to a detention moon aboard the Imperial prison barge Purge. The letter was recovered aboard Purge after its occupants were decimated by a plague so it is unlikely that it reached her before it was released to the public for academic purposes in relation to the history of Purge.
